text: Great movie, okay game. This is my favorite theme in the game, you almost don't want to quit the screen and retry. It seems like Kodaka didn't have the classic Sunsoft instruments yet (mainly the bass) since his later compositions are very unique on the NES, you can usually quickly guess when it's a game composed by him.
